body_content.explanation: in a way where the result of a chemical reaction is controlled by the position of the atoms within the molecules (= a unit of a chemical substance made of a group of two or more atoms) involved in the reaction:
examples: A series of stereospecifically labelled polyunsaturated fatty acids was prepared by biosynthesis.
The reactions take place stereospecifically in most cases, regardless of the type of reagent used.
